title: Engage lawyer for consultation
description: Find lawyer specializing in: land law, corporate law, securities law, currency regulation. Budget: 2-5K USD. Legal research completed in 04-LEGAL-MEMO.md

title: Image upload for Tiptap articles
close_reason: Image upload for Tiptap editors implemented

title: Land research: identify regions with cheap land
description: Research regions: Altai Krai, Krasnodar Krai, Tver Oblast, Pskov Oblast, Kaluga Oblast, Voronezh Oblast. Create land price database with 10-20 examples.

title: Fix landing header overlaps + center hero composition
description: Production landing header: logo 'СЛОБОДА' overlaps nav items (e.g. 'Что это', 'Как работает'), and 'FAQ' overlaps 'Поддержать'. Fix header layout so items never overlap (prefer: fewer primary items + menu; grid layout; overflow constraints). Also center hero composition (avoid left-heavy + side card), keep key theses high-signal and mobile-first.

title: Implement AI Librarian service for knowledge classification
Connect registration form to backend
description: Set up Supabase or similar to store form submissions. Include: user data, motivation, skills, investor details.
close_reason: Implemented Express.js API with PostgreSQL on Railway. Form submissions saved to registrations table via /api/register endpoint. Includes rate limiting, security headers, and validation.

title: Add real hero background image/video
description: Replace placeholder Unsplash image with custom photography: modern rural houses, blue sky, nature. Consider video option.

title: Record first YouTube video: The Thesis
description: AI unemployment to rural migration thesis video. Honest reasoning, no sales pitch.

title: Replace founder photo placeholder with real photo
description: Current photo is an Unsplash stock image. Replace with real founder photo in src/index.html img tag (class=founder-photo). Host image or add to repo.

title: Change default admin password in production
close_reason: Set new admin password on Railway, RESET_ADMIN_PASSWORD=true will apply on next deploy

title: Verify sloboda.land domain in Resend
description: Add DNS records to verify sloboda.land domain in Resend so emails send from noreply@sloboda.land instead of onboarding@resend.dev. Required for production email delivery.

title: UI/UX Overhaul: World-Class Design System
close_reason: UI/UX overhaul complete: motion animations, premium components, responsive mobile, all pages polished

title: Implement actual email sending with Resend
close_reason: Implemented Resend email service, campaign sending, welcome emails, admin notifications, improved campaign modal UI

title: Add founder photo
description: Replace ФМ placeholder with actual Philip Miller photo in founder section
close_reason: Duplicate of derevnya-a6h. Placeholder photo already added in commit e8d8841.

title: Create privacy policy page
description: Legal requirement for form with personal data collection. RU + EN versions.

title: Get Resend API key and set RESEND_API_KEY on Railway
description: Sign up at resend.com, create API key, set RESEND_API_KEY env var on Railway. Email service is implemented but won't send until this is done.

title: Create YouTube channel
description: Set up YouTube for long-form content and trust building

description: Set up Telegram community channel as primary communication hub

description: Select final name (SLOBODA/DEREVNYA/other), register domain, establish brand identity

title: Add social share meta tags (OG image, Twitter card)
description: Ensure Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags use a proper branded image. Currently using generic Unsplash field photo.

title: Set up React + Vite + TypeScript client application
close_reason: React + Vite + TypeScript client scaffolded with full routing, layouts, components, stores, services, and types. Build passes cleanly.

title: Landing: compact hero тезисы + sticky навигация + ссылка на подробную концепцию
description: Сделать главную страницу более high-signal: в hero разместить ключевые постулаты/тезисы и CTA с якорями на нужные секции. Навигация должна быть всегда доступна (sticky header) и удобна mobile-first. Добавить ссылку на отдельную подробную страницу с развернутой концепцией (knowledge base + governance + сеть экопоселений).
